welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Hampton, where the charming seaside town meets luxury and relaxation. Get ready to experience the beauty of our beaches, historic landmarks, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Hampton Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at East Hampton Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montauk Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montauk Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New London Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New London Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westerly State Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westerly State Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Block Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
